main.name: William Loe
main.description: An accomplished 20 year old Computer Scientist with a background in C++, Java, JavaScript, CSS, MySQL, and C#, who is hungry to learn and never gives up
main.bio: My name is William Loe and I am a Computer Scientist with a background in C++, Java, JavaScript, CSS, MySQL, and C#. I will be graduating from Texas A&M University of Corpus Christi in December 2020 with a Bachelor of Science in Computer Science with a minor in Mathematics.
main.contactmessage: Currently, I'm seeking a full time Software Engineering or Data Analyst position preferably in Texas (US), but I am willing to relocate.

education.degree: Bachelor of Science in Computer Science, Minor in Mathematics
